title: is there a such posibility?
content:
hello,

is there a posibility to make different glyphs for the same character in the same word if a character repeats? for example if there's a word - Weezer. when first e comes, then second e goes from another glyph. how to make it? and if there's a word WIDOW - how to make the second w in the word to be different?
author: gamawaves

comments.content: There are numerous old threads that explain how to do this using CALT and they can all be found with a search.

i've searched and read threads about other interesting calt and other features, but i cannot find any that could help me in this situation. perhaps i don't know specific key words that would show the right info. as many font making stuff is new to me, i find tons of pages to read, so typophile helps me anyway...
thank you Goran, i know than feature when a character goes after another, but i want a script that changes some characters that repeat in the same word
